author: BaneShake
title: Red and Blue Player Review
review: This is a great set. It is fun, cheap, and works well as a game you can play against anyone else. Not only can you use it for hockey, but you can also use them as giant robots with your minifigs! I have no cons to bring to your attention.

author: lego123456gh
title: Best sport set ever
review:
I got this set yesterday and have never stoped playing with it since,it is just brilliant. 

pros: 
exellent style 
works very easily

good for partys 

cons:
none! 

I would recomend this set to anyone.
